comments:
Build 200401060800
While running an ant script in the same jre as Eclipse, I attempted to look at 
another ant build script by double clicking on the *.xml file.  I got 
an "unable to create editor part" message.  The following was in the log.  Once 
my ant script finished running, I was able to open the build script.

Lynne are you able to reproduce this?

I have failed in my attempts.
The NPE would occur if for some reason the xml file holding the task 
descriptions for the Ant tasks could not be parsed successfully. It really 
should be independant of running an Ant build.

Yes I can reproduce it.  I think it is related to running out of memory when 
using Ant with the workspace JRE.  I am getting a lot of missing icons (i.e., 
little red squares instead of the icon) in the workbench.  When are the builds 
going to include a later version of Ant?

Thanks Lynne.
Builds I20040113 and greater have Ant 1.6.0
